mapper.update: update bd_unload_goods set dr=1 where task_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update bd_task_program set active=1 where task_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and program_id=#{newProgram,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update bd_task_program set active=0 where task_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select k.shop_id,k.company_id,k.specification_id,COUNT(1) sumval,ca.name as categoryname from bd_unload_goods k left join bd_specification n on n.id=k.specification_id left join bd_specification_program m on m.id=n.program_id left join bd_category ca on ca.id=m.category_id where k.task_id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by k.shop_id,k.company_id,k.specification_id,ca.name

SELECT t.id, t.cussup_id as cussupid, t.remark, t.`status`, t.type, c.`name` AS cussupName FROM bd_task t LEFT JOIN bd_customer c ON t.cussup_id = c.id WHERE t.type = 2 AND t.dr = 0 AND t.`status` IN (0, 3) AND t.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.shop_id=#{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update bd_stock set quantity=quantity+ #{sumval,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where specification_id = #{specificationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and dr=0
mapper.insert: insert into bd_bill(id,shop_id,company_id,bill_no,cussup_id,bill_date,type,quantity,amount,status,creator,createtime,modifier,modifytime,dr,real_amount,categoryname) values(#{id},#{shopId},#{companyId},(select a.spcode from(SELECT CONCAT('BL',LPAD((SELECT COUNT(1)+1 from bd_bill),8,'0')) as spcode FROM DUAL) a), #{cussupId},#{billDate},#{type},#{quantity},#{amount},1,#{creator},#{createtime},#{modifier},#{modifytime},0,#{amount},#{categoryname})
